author: cbs8
title: Oil and Gas Investor Recognizes Rising Stars with 30 Under 40 Program
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Hart Energy
HOUSTON , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The editors of Oil and Gas Investor are pleased to announce the honorees of its annual 30 Under 40 program. These rising stars excelled in the areas of entrepreneurial spirit, creative problem solving, leadership, and community involvement. Industry leaders come from the sectors of exploration and production, acquisitions and divestitures, oilfield services, midstream, and finance. Oil and Gas Investor 's website includes video interviews and other special features with the individuals. Profiles of the honorees also appear in the October 2015 issue of Oil and Gas Investor .
The 2015 honorees are:
Kim Bourgeois , Managing Director – Energy Investment Banking, Capital One Securities Wood Brookshire , Chairman, CEO and Co-Founder, Vendera Resources Cody Campbell and John A. Sellers , Co-CEOs and Co-Founders, Double Eagle Development Chris G. Carter , Managing Partner, NGP Energy Capital Management Lee J. Dunn , VP Business Development, CrownQuest Operating Dan K. Eberhart , CEO, Canary Mike Dane , VP Finance, Fieldwood Energy John Frey , Manager, Business Development, FourPoint Energy Mark Hiduke , Managing Director, PCORE Exploration & Production Rob Jackson , Director of Development Planning, Mountaineer Keystone Peter Jeffe , Co-Founder and Head of Business Development, Hawkwood Energy Kyle M. Kafka , Managing Director, EnCap Investments Kyle R. Koontz , VP Engineering, Templar Energy/Le Norman Operating Mike Lennox , District Manager-West Texas, Helmerich & Payne Ryan D. Lewellyn , President and CEO, Tall Oak Midstream R. Adam Miller , Director, Intrepid Financial Partners Heath Mireles , Manager, Resource Development, Northern Region, Continental Resources Matt Owens , Founder & President, Extraction Oil & Gas Kimberly Thames Padeletti , Project Risk Management, BHP Billiton Vignesh Proddaturi , VP-Engineering & Acquisitions, Millennial Energy Partners Andrew Rapp , Managing Director & Co-Founder, Petrie Partners Kevin M. Riley , EVP, Business Development, Riley Exploration Group Vicki Blocker Risinger , Global Business Development Manager, FMC Technologies Matthew P. Sheehy , President, Rockies Express Pipeline , unit of Tallgrass Energy Partners Jerry Smith , Managing Director, EnCap Investments Justin T. Stolte , Manager, Business Development, Apache Justin Stone , International Exploration-Drilling Operations Manager, Anadarko Petroleum Jeter Thomas , CFO, Caerus Oil and Gas Colin Watson , VP, Energy Finance, Bank of Texas Mason Woodard , CFO, Phillips Energy Partners About Hart Energy
For more than 40 years, Hart Energy editors and experts have delivered market-leading insights to investors and energy industry professionals. The Houston -based company produces award-winning magazines (such as Oil and Gas Investor , E&P and Midstream Business ); online news and data services; in-depth industry conferences (like the DUG ™ series); GIS data sets and mapping solutions; and a range of research and consulting services. For information, visit hartenergy.com .
